#AUTOMATIC SSH INTO DEVICE

###generate SSH key in local folder (skip if it exits)
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "trim.bresilla@gmail.com"

###run command to copy this key to server
ssh-copy-id id@server

###start the ssh-agent
eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"

###add ssh-key to ssh-agent
ssh-add -k ~/.ssh/id_rsa


#USE SSH WITH  GITHUB

###make the repo use git+ssh instead of https, to check it use
git remote show origin

###change repo from https to git+ssh
git remote set-url origin git+ssh://git@github.com/<username>/<reponame.git>
